short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate a guided experience on any platform (3rd Party or Your Own)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ziplyne's EU-POC Player is here to assist you while executing any business process on the software you are using within your company. This technology will be there to help onboard, train and support you while making the end-user experience even easier on top of the software you are using.

This version uses Authentication login to authenticate you as a user.
